verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> Unto <S%H413><s%> thee, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
O my God, <S%H430><s%> I trust <S%H982><s%> in thee: let me not <S%H408><s%> be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> let not <S%H408><s%> mine enemies <S%H341><s%> triumph <S%H5970><s%> over me.

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> let none <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> that wait <S%H6960><s%> on thee be ashamed: <S%H954><s%> let them be ashamed <S%H954><s%> which transgress <S%H898><s%> without cause. <S%H7387><s%>
Show <S%H3045><s%> me thy ways, <S%H1870><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> teach <S%H3925><s%> me thy paths. <S%H734><s%>

Lead <S%H1869><s%> me in thy truth, <S%H571><s%> and teach <S%H3925><s%> me: for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation; <S%H3468><s%> on thee do I wait <S%H6960><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day. <S%H3117><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thy tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> and thy lovingkindnesses; <S%H2617><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> have been ever of old. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> not <S%H408><s%> the sins <S%H2403><s%> of my youth, <S%H5271><s%> nor my transgressions: <S%H6588><s%> according to thy mercy <S%H2617><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> me for thy goodness' sake, <S%H4616><s%> <S%H2898><s%> O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Good <S%H2896><s%> and upright <S%H3477><s%> is the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> will he teach <S%H3384><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the way. <S%H1870><s%>
The meek <S%H6035><s%> will he guide <S%H1869><s%> in judgment: <S%H4941><s%> and the meek <S%H6035><s%> will he teach <S%H3925><s%> his way. <S%H1870><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> unto such as keep <S%H5341><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> and his testimonies. <S%H5713><s%>
For thy name's sake, <S%H4616><s%> <S%H8034><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> pardon <S%H5545><s%> mine iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is great. <S%H7227><s%>
What <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is he that <S%H2088><s%> feareth <S%H3373><s%> the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> him shall he teach <S%H3384><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> that he shall choose. <S%H977><s%>
His soul <S%H5315><s%> shall dwell <S%H3885><s%> at ease; <S%H2896><s%> and his seed <S%H2233><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
The secret <S%H5475><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him; and he will show <S%H3045><s%> them his covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

Mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> are ever <S%H8548><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall pluck my feet out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H7272><s%> of the net. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7568><s%>
Turn <S%H6437><s%> thee unto <S%H413><s%> me, and have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me; for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am desolate <S%H3173><s%> and afflicted. <S%H6041><s%>
The troubles <S%H6869><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%> are enlarged: <S%H7337><s%> O bring thou me out <S%H3318><s%> of my distresses. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4691><s%>
Look upon <S%H7200><s%> mine affliction <S%H6040><s%> and my pain; <S%H5999><s%> and forgive <S%H5375><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my sins. <S%H2403><s%>
Consider <S%H7200><s%> mine enemies; <S%H341><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they are many; <S%H7231><s%> and they hate <S%H8130><s%> me with cruel <S%H2555><s%> hatred. <S%H8135><s%>
O keep <S%H8104><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me: let me not <S%H408><s%> be ashamed; <S%H954><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I put my trust <S%H2620><s%> in thee.
Let integrity <S%H8537><s%> and uprightness <S%H3476><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> me; for <S%H3588><s%> I wait on <S%H6960><s%> thee.
Redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> his troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
